price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ehe raba rero ukuntu Twebwe Allah, Twahaye bamwe mu bantu Tubasumbanisha mu bibabeshaho hamwe no mu bikorwa bashoboye. Ni ukuri, ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ku bemeramana, ni bwo bw’icubahiro muri vyose gusumba ubwo kw’isi.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ أَكۡبَرُ دَرَجَٰتٖ وَأَكۡبَرُ تَفۡضِيلٗا

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa faḍḍalnā baʿḍahum ʿalā baʿḍin walalākhiratu akbaru darajātin wa-akbaru tafḍīlan
